verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H935>Go<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me.
And if you <S%H3986>refuse<s%> to let them <S%H7971>go,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H5062>smite<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1366>borders<s%> with <S%H6854>frogs:<s%>

And the <S%H2975>river<s%> shall <S%H8317>bring<s%> <S%H8317>forth<s%> <S%H6854>frogs<s%> <S%H8317>abundantly,<s%> which shall <S%H5927>go<s%> up and <S%H935>come<s%> into your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and into your <S%H2315>bedchamber,<s%> <S%H4904><s%> and on your <S%H4296>bed,<s%> and into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and on your <S%H5971>people,<s%> and into your <S%H8574>ovens,<s%> and into your kneading <S%H4863>troughs:<s%>
And the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> up both on you, and on your <S%H5971>people,<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>Say<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H5186>Stretch<s%> forth your <S%H3027>hand<s%> with your <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5104>streams,<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H2975>rivers,<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H98>ponds,<s%> and cause <S%H6854>frogs<s%> to <S%H5927>come<s%> up on the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up, and <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
And the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> with their <S%H3909>enchantments,<s%> and <S%H5927>brought<s%> up <S%H6854>frogs<s%> on the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6279>Entreat<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that he may <S%H5493>take<s%> away the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> from me, and from my <S%H5971>people;<s%> and I will let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may do <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H6286>Glory<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> me: <S%H4970>when<s%> shall I <S%H6279>entreat<s%> for you, and for your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and for your <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H3772>destroy<s%> the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> from you and your <S%H1004>houses,<s%> that they may <S%H7604>remain<s%> in the <S%H2975>river<s%> <S%H7535>only?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> To <S%H4279>morrow.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> Be it according to your <S%H1697>word:<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that there is <S%H369>none<s%> like to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

And the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> shall <S%H5493>depart<s%> from you, and from your <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and from your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and from your <S%H5971>people;<s%> they shall <S%H7604>remain<s%> in the <S%H2975>river<s%> <S%H7535>only.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out from <S%H6547>Pharaoh:<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H1697><s%> of the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H7760>brought<s%> against <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> and the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> out of the <S%H1004>houses,<s%> out of the <S%H2691>villages,<s%> and out of the <S%H7704>fields.<s%>
And they <S%H6651>gathered<s%> them together on <S%H2563>heaps:<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H887>stank.<s%>

But when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there was <S%H7309>respite,<s%> he <S%H3513>hardened<s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H8085>listened<s%> not to them; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>said.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>Say<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H5186>Stretch<s%> out your <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> that it may <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H3654>lice<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so;<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand<s%> with his <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and it <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H3654>lice<s%> in <S%H120>man,<s%> and in <S%H929>beast;<s%> all the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H3654>lice<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> so with their <S%H3909>enchantments<s%> to <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3654>lice,<s%> but they <S%H3201>could<s%> not: <S%H3651>so<s%> there were <S%H3654>lice<s%> on <S%H120>man,<s%> and on <S%H929>beast.<s%>

Then the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H1931>This<s%> is the <S%H676>finger<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%> and <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H2388>hardened,<s%> and he <S%H8085>listened<s%> not to them; as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>said.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H7925>Rise<s%> up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh;<s%> <S%H2009>see,<s%> he <S%H3318>comes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to the <S%H4325>water;<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> Let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me.

<S%H3588>Else,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you will not let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies on you, and on your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and on your <S%H5971>people,<s%> and into your <S%H1004>houses:<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies, and <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> where <S%H834>on<s%> <S%H5921><s%> they are.

And I will <S%H6395>sever<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5975>dwell,<s%> that <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies shall be <S%H8033>there;<s%> to the <S%H4616>end<s%> you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
And I will <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H6304>division<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> and your <S%H5971>people:<s%> to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> shall <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H226>sign<s%> be.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so;<s%> and there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H3515>grievous<s%> <S%H6157>swarm<s%> of flies into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and into his servants' <S%H5650><s%><S%H1004>houses,<s%> and into <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of the <S%H6157>swarm<s%> of flies.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and for <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>Go<s%> you, <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> It is not <S%H3559>meet<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> to <S%H6213>do;<s%> for we shall <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H8441>abomination<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H2005>see,<s%> shall we <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> the <S%H8441>abomination<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and will they not <S%H5619>stone<s%> us?

We will <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> days' <S%H3117><s%><S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> as he shall <S%H559>command<s%> us.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I will let you <S%H7971>go,<s%> that you may <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> you shall not <S%H3212>go<s%> very <S%H7368>far<s%> away: <S%H6279>entreat<s%> for me.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I <S%H3318>go<s%> out from you, and I will <S%H6279>entreat<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that the <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies may <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> from his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and from his <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H4279>morrow:<s%> but let not <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> deal <S%H2048>deceitfully<s%> <S%H3254>any<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> in not letting the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out from <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H6279>entreated<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> and he <S%H5493>removed<s%> the <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of flies from <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> from his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and from his <S%H5971>people;<s%> there <S%H7604>remained<s%> not <S%H259>one.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3513>hardened<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> at <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> would he let the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>
